title: Ep 4: Bath of Least Resistance with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:title: Ep 4: Bath of Least Resistance with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree talk to Jasmine Guillory, author of The Wedding Date, about the benefits of a daily yoga practice, her lipstick obsession, and why the bathtub is the best place to read a book. Kate also breaks down her nighttime skincare routine and Dor...
description:
Kate and Doree talk to Jasmine Guillory, author of The Wedding Date, about the benefits of a daily yoga practice, her lipstick obsession, and why the bathtub is the best place to read a book. Kate also breaks down her nighttime skincare routine and Doree discusses her weekend of self-care!

For a list of all the products mentioned on this episode, visit www.forever35podcast.com. Follow the podcast on Instagram @forever35podcast and on Twitter at @forever35pod, and join the Forever35 Facebook group at www.facebook.com/groups/forever35podcast. You can email Kate and Doree at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
